Package com.google.wave.api.oauth.impl

Class Summary
OAuthServiceImpl Implements the OAuthService interface.
OAuthUser Objects of this class are stored in Datastore to persist an association between user's wave id + wave id, the user's access token, and the service consumer secret.
OpenSocialHttpClient A small implementation of HttpClient to serve the needs of the OAuth library rather than requiring org.apache.http.client as a dependency.
OpenSocialUrl An object which represents a simple URL.
PopupLoginFormHandler Adds a gadget that automatically opens a new browser window directed to the service provider authorization url.
SimpleLoginFormHandler Generates a login form in Wavelet to direct user to OAuth service login.
SingletonPersistenceManagerFactory PersistenceManagerFactory singleton wrapper class.
 

Exception Summary
OAuthServiceException A checked exception thrown by the Java robot oauth library.
